page.title: 13Policing in Occold
page.content: The role of a policeman is the protection of life and property and the prevention and detection of crime. There are 7 policeman,they patrol Eye and 17 more villages.Each constable is responsible for 3 to 4 villages. To do this he patrols in a motor car and when possible talks about problems and various other subjects to members of his parishes.Most of the crimes are qiute minor but sometimes more serious crimes are reported.These crimes are invigated by D.C.Sayer.Matters that end up in court are heard by Hartismere Magistrates that now sit at Diss Corn Hall about 7 miles away
